data.name: Tokyo Snap (Cozy Pitch)
data.detailed_description:
ONE OF FOUR GAMES IN COZY PITCH PACK

Tokyo Snap is one of four short games in the Cozy Pitch Pack. Each game is a polished idea that we know can turn into something much bigger. Vote for your favorite using the in-game menus and the winner gets expanded in a sequel. Cast your vote and make your voice heard!

FEATURES


Spend a week in Tokyo to get some great photos for your feed. Learn the latest fashion trends, make friends, and take the perfect pictures to rack up likes on Street Snaps.


CAPTURE THE PERFECT PIC
Learn how to take the perfect trendy picture. Pay attention to your composition and the latest fashion trends to get the best response.


MAKE FRIENDS
Get to know the fashionable locals. Each character has a different story and a different fashion style.

GET POPULAR ON STREET SNAPS
Select your best pictures, “upload” them to Street Snaps, and get comments on your photos telling you how well you did and how to improve. Get enough followers and you can even get free upgrades to your gear from sponsored brands! (Note: this game is completely offline and all ‘online’ interactions are simulated).

COZY GAME PALS

We are a duo of experienced creatives. Bryan is the coder, he has worked on Journey, The Last of Us, and Uncharted 4. Crista is the is the artist, she has worked at Cartoon Network, Nickelodeon, FOX, and Warner Bros. We are working together as Cozy Game Pals to add variety to the types of games available.

data.short_description: Spend a week in Tokyo to get some great photos for your feed. Learn the latest fashion trends, make friends, and take the perfect pictures to rack up likes on Street Snaps.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
